title: Dream Believers
artist: Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club
center: Sayaka Murano (6 member Ver.) Kaho Hinoshita (4 member Ver. & 105th Class Ver.) Kozue Otomune (104th Class Ver.) Megumi Fujishima (SAKURA Ver.)
description: Dream Believers is Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club's first mini album as well as the theme song for the Link! Like! Love Live! app. It was released on March 29, 2023.
